revision.text: Unlike most other [[Shops|Shop]] items, Masterball prices do not drop after route encounters. Every purchase raises its price by 35%, capping off at 100 times the base price.
revision.comment: FuzzyBot moved page [[Translations:Pokéballs/17/en]] to [[Translations:Poké Balls/17/en]] without leaving a redirect: Part of translatable page "Pokéballs"
